languages.text: "Не знаю, Ваша Светлость, но от него Имматериум... вскипел. Он и прежде был лишенным покоя, ревущим океаном, в который опасно погружаться, но ныне это купель безумия, в которой посланные образы сплавляются, коверкаются и с хохотом рушатся на тебя. Могучий {g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictumGlossary}варп-шторм{/g}, каких я не помню, бушует в Эмпирее, и это наполняет ужасом".

"We do not know, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but... it has brought the Immaterium to a boil. It has always been a violent, roaring ocean that could spell doom to any who would consider stepping into its waters. Now, however, it has become a cradle of madness where expelled images fuse together, twisting and cackling, before crashing into the minds of all who perceive it. A mighty {g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictumGlossary}warp storm{/g} the likes of which I cannot recall rages in the Empyrean, and it fills me with terror."
languages.original_text: "Не знаю, Ваша Светлость, но от него Имматериум... вскипел. Он и прежде был лишенным покоя, ревущим океаном, в который опасно погружаться, но ныне это купель безумия, в которой посланные образы сплавляются, коверкаются и с хохотом рушатся на тебя. Могучий {g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictumGlossary}варп-шторм{/g}, каких я не помню, бушует в Эмпирее, и это наполняет ужасом".

traits.locale_text: "We do not know, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but... it has brought the Immaterium to a boil. It has always been a violent, roaring ocean that could spell doom to any who would consider stepping into its waters. Now, however, it has become a cradle of madness where expelled images fuse together, twisting and cackling, before crashing into one's mind. A mighty warp storm the likes of which I cannot recall rages in the Empyrean, and it fills me with terror."

"The Immaterium... is boiling over. It was restless before, a roaring ocean dangerous to dive into, but now it is a font of madness which melds together and mangles the images sent into it, and bellows with laughter as it unleashes them upon you. A mighty warp storm the likes of which I cannot recall is raging in the Empyrean, and it is terrifying."

"We do not know, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but... it has brought the Immaterium to a boil. It has always been a violent, roaring ocean that could spell doom to any who would consider stepping into its waters. Now, however, it has become a cradle of madness where expelled images fuse together, twisting and cackling, before crashing into the minds of all who perceive it. A mighty {g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictumGlossary}warp storm{/g} the likes of which I cannot recall rages in the Empyrean, and it fills me with terror."

"The Immaterium... is boiling over. It was restless before, a roaring ocean dangerous to dive into, but now it is a font of madness which melds together and mangles the images sent into it. It bellows with laughter as it unleashes them back upon you. A mighty warp storm the likes of which I cannot recall is raging in the Empyrean, and it is terrifying."

"We do not know, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but... it has brought the Immaterium to a boil. It has always been a violent, roaring ocean that could spell doom to any who would consider stepping into its waters. Now, however, it has become a cradle of madness where expelled images fuse together, twisting and cackling, before crashing into the minds of all who perceive it. A mighty {g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictumGlossary}warp storm{/g} the likes of which I cannot recall rages in the Empyrean, and it fills me with terror."

languages.text: «No lo sabemos, mi{mf|lord|lady}, pero... el Inmaterio es un hervidero. Siempre es un océano violento y atronador que ofrece muerte a quienes osen atravesarlo, pero ahora es una vorágine de locura en la que las imágenes emitidas se funden, retorcidas y carcajeantes, antes de irrumpir en las mentes de quienes lo perciben. Una {g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictumGlossary}tormenta de disformidad{/g} como nunca había visto sacude el Empíreo y me llena de terror».
languages.original_text: "We do not know, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but... it has brought the Immaterium to a boil. It has always been a violent, roaring ocean that could spell doom to any who would consider stepping into its waters. Now, however, it has become a cradle of madness where expelled images fuse together, twisting and cackling, before crashing into the minds of all who perceive it. A mighty {g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictumGlossary}warp storm{/g} the likes of which I cannot recall rages in the Empyrean, and it fills me with terror."

traits.locale_text: «No lo sabemos, mi{mf|lord|lady}, pero... el Inmaterio es un hervidero. Siempre es un océano violento y atronador que ofrece muerte a quienes osen atravesarlo, pero ahora es una vorágine de locura en la que las imágenes emitidas se funden, retorcidas y carcajeantes, antes de irrumpir en las mentes de quienes lo perciben. Una {g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictumGlossary}tormenta de disformidad{/g} como nunca había visto sacude el Empíreo y me llena de terror».

«El Inmaterio... hierve. Antes estaba inquieto; un océano aullante en el que era arriesgado sumergirse, pero ahora es una fuente de locura que funde y desfigura las imágenes que se envían mediante él y estalla en carcajadas cuando te las devuelve. Se ha desatado una tormenta de disformidad en el Empíreo de proporciones que jamás había visto, y es aterradora».

languages.text: 「それはわかりません、陛下。ですが…非物質世界は煮えたぎっています。それはいつだって、そこに足を踏み入れようとする者に破滅をもたらすような、激しく轟く海でした。ところが今、それは狂気の揺りかごとなっており、吐き出されたイメージが融合し、ねじれ、不協和音を発しながら、それを知覚するすべての者の精神に押し寄せてくるのです。記憶にないような強大な{g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictumGlossary}<歪み>の嵐{/g}がエンピリアンに吹き荒れており、それが私を恐怖で支配しているのです」
languages.original_text: "We do not know, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but... it has brought the Immaterium to a boil. It has always been a violent, roaring ocean that could spell doom to any who would consider stepping into its waters. Now, however, it has become a cradle of madness where expelled images fuse together, twisting and cackling, before crashing into the minds of all who perceive it. A mighty {g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictumGlossary}warp storm{/g} the likes of which I cannot recall rages in the Empyrean, and it fills me with terror."

traits.locale_text: 「それはわかりません、陛下。ですが…非物質世界は煮えたぎっています。それはいつだって、そこに足を踏み入れようとする者に破滅をもたらすような、激しく轟く海でした。ところが今、それは狂気の揺りかごとなっており、吐き出されたイメージが融合し、ねじれ、不協和音を発しながら、それを知覚するすべての者の精神に押し寄せてくるのです。記憶にないような強大な{g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictumGlossary}<歪み>の嵐{/g}がエンピリアンに吹き荒れており、それが私を恐怖で支配しているのです」
「非物質世界は…煮えたぎっている。以前は落ち着きがなく、飛び込めもしない危険な騒乱の海だったが、今では狂気の泉と化し、送り込まれたイメージは混ざり合って、押しつぶされる。そして大声で笑いながら、メッセージを突き返すのだ。思い出すのも難しい、激しい〈歪み〉の嵐がエンピリアンに吹き荒れていて恐ろしいのだよ」

languages.text: “我们也不清楚，大人，不过……在尖啸声的影响下，亚空间此刻正在沸腾。亚空间一直都相当躁动不安，就像咆哮的海洋一样，潜入其中非常危险。可现在，它变得就像是疯狂的摇篮一样，所有图像都融合在了一起，不断扭曲、咯咯作响，闯入所有灵能者的脑海之中。至高天发生了恐怖的{g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictumGlossary}亚空间风暴{/g}，像这么可怕的风暴，我以前从来没遇到过。”
languages.original_text: "We do not know, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but... it has brought the Immaterium to a boil. It has always been a violent, roaring ocean that could spell doom to any who would consider stepping into its waters. Now, however, it has become a cradle of madness where expelled images fuse together, twisting and cackling, before crashing into the minds of all who perceive it. A mighty {g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictumGlossary}warp storm{/g} the likes of which I cannot recall rages in the Empyrean, and it fills me with terror."

traits.locale_text: “我们也不清楚，大人，不过……在尖啸声的影响下，亚空间此刻正在沸腾。亚空间一直都相当躁动不安，就像咆哮的海洋一样，潜入其中非常危险。可现在，它变得就像是疯狂的摇篮一样，所有图像都融合在了一起，不断扭曲、咯咯作响，闯入所有灵能者的脑海之中。至高天发生了恐怖的{g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictumGlossary}亚空间风暴{/g}，像这么可怕的风暴，我以前从来没遇到过。”
“亚空间……一直在沸腾。它一直都很躁动不安，就像咆哮的海洋一样，潜入其中非常危险。可现在，它简直就像是疯狂的根源一样，所有的东西都融合在一起，星语图像也变得一团糟。它在放声大笑，将乱七八糟的图像丢到所有人的脑子里。目前，至高天发生了一场致命的{g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictumGlossary}亚空间风暴{/g}，这么可怕的风暴我以前还从来没遇到过。”

languages.text: "Das wissen wir nicht, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, aber ... er bringt das Immaterium zum Kochen. Es war schon immer ein wütender, aufgewühlter Ozean, der jeden zu verschlingen droht, der sich in seine Gewässer wagt. Nun ist es jedoch eine Wiege des Wahnsinns, in der verstoßene Bilder verschmelzen, ehe sie in den Verstand all jener eindringen, die sie wahrnehmen. Ein mächtiger {g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictumGlossary}Warpsturm{/g} wie ich ihn noch nie erlebt habe, wütet im Empyreum und erfüllt mich mit Entsetzen.
languages.original_text: "We do not know, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but... it has brought the Immaterium to a boil. It has always been a violent, roaring ocean that could spell doom to any who would consider stepping into its waters. Now, however, it has become a cradle of madness where expelled images fuse together, twisting and cackling, before crashing into the minds of all who perceive it. A mighty {g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictumGlossary}warp storm{/g} the likes of which I cannot recall rages in the Empyrean, and it fills me with terror."

traits.locale_text: "Das wissen wir nicht, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, aber ... er bringt das Immaterium zum Kochen. Es war schon immer ein wütender, aufgewühlter Ozean, der jeden zu verschlingen droht, der sich in seine Gewässer wagt. Nun ist es jedoch eine Wiege des Wahnsinns, in der verstoßene Bilder verschmelzen, ehe sie in den Verstand all jener eindringen, die sie wahrnehmen. Ein mächtiger {g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictumGlossary}Warpsturm{/g} wie ich ihn noch nie erlebt habe, wütet im Empyreum und erfüllt mich mit Entsetzen.

"Das Immaterium ... kocht über. Zuvor war es rastlos, ein brüllender Ozean, in den einzutauchen gefährlich war. Nun jedoch ist es ein Quell des Irrsinns, der die in ihn geschickten Bilder verschmelzt und verzerrt. Brüllend vor Lachen hetzt er sie wieder auf einen. Ein mächtiger Warpsturm, wie ich ihn noch nie erlebt habe, tobt im Empyreum, und es ist furchterregend."

languages.text: « Nous l'ignorons, Votre Seigneurie, mais... l'Immaterium est en ébullition. S'il a toujours été un océan déchaîné et mugissant capable de sceller la ruine de quiconque ose mettre un pied dans ses eaux, c'est désormais un antre de démence où les images se confondent et se mêlent à grand fracas avant de percuter de plein fouet les esprits de tous ceux qui ont le malheur de les percevoir. Une {g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictumGlossary}tempête Warp{/g} d'une puissance inouïe fait rage dans l'Empyrée, et elle me glace de terreur. »
languages.original_text: "We do not know, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but... it has brought the Immaterium to a boil. It has always been a violent, roaring ocean that could spell doom to any who would consider stepping into its waters. Now, however, it has become a cradle of madness where expelled images fuse together, twisting and cackling, before crashing into the minds of all who perceive it. A mighty {g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictumGlossary}warp storm{/g} the likes of which I cannot recall rages in the Empyrean, and it fills me with terror."

traits.locale_text: « Nous l'ignorons, Votre Seigneurie, mais... l'Immaterium est en ébullition. S'il a toujours été un océan déchaîné et mugissant capable de sceller la ruine de quiconque ose mettre un pied dans ses eaux, c'est désormais un antre de démence où les images se confondent et se mêlent à grand fracas avant de percuter de plein fouet les esprits de tous ceux qui ont le malheur de les percevoir. Une {g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictumGlossary}tempête Warp{/g} d'une puissance inouïe fait rage dans l'Empyrée, et elle me glace de terreur. »

« L'Immaterium est... en ébullition. Il a toujours été agité, tel un océan rugissant dans lequel on hésiterait à plonger, mais maintenant, c'est devenu un puits de folie qui fusionne et déforme les images qui lui sont envoyées. Maintenant, c'est comme s'il les déchaînait sur vous en hurlant de rire. Une tempête Warp d'une puissance inouïe fait rage dans l'Empyrée, et elle est monstrueuse. »

languages.text: "Bilmiyoruz {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri ancak... Tindiyar'ı patlama noktasına getirdi. Tindiyar, her daim sularına adım atmaya cüret edenlerin başına felaket getirecek denli şiddetle kükreyen bir okyanusu andırmıştır. Şimdiyse defedilmiş çarpık suretlerin kıkır kıkır gülerek kaynaştığı, sonra da kendilerini algılayan tüm zihinlere hücuma geçtiği bir tür deliliğin beşiğine döndü. Aklıma eşi benzeri gelmeyecek türde kudretli bir {g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictumGlossary}öteboyut fırtınası{/g}, tüm öfkesiyle Gök Diyar'ı kasıp kavuruyor. Bu da beni dehşete düşürüyor."
languages.original_text: "We do not know, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but... it has brought the Immaterium to a boil. It has always been a violent, roaring ocean that could spell doom to any who would consider stepping into its waters. Now, however, it has become a cradle of madness where expelled images fuse together, twisting and cackling, before crashing into the minds of all who perceive it. A mighty {g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictumGlossary}warp storm{/g} the likes of which I cannot recall rages in the Empyrean, and it fills me with terror."
